newsitem.title: SRI LANKA: Sri Lanka benchmark 12-month T-bills unhanged.
newsitem.headline: Sri Lanka benchmark 12-month T-bills unhanged.

text.p: The average yields on 12-month treasury bills remained unchanged while those on three-month bills rose by 0.04 percentage points and six-month bills fell by 0.01 percentage points at Monday's auction, the Central Bank said.
Bids received Bids accepted Avg yield
NOTE - Bids in million rupees, yields in percent (previous week's yields in brackets).
